titles.title: Express Loan Improvements Act of 2009
A bill to improve the Express Loan Program of the Small Business Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary: 11/20/2009--Introduced. Express Loan Improvements Act of 2009 - Amends provisions of the Small Business Act relating to the Express Loan Program to: (1) increase (for a two-year period) from 50% to 75% the maximum percentage of such loan that may be guaranteed by the Small Business Administration (SBA); and (2) increase from $350,000 to $1 million the maximum loan amount.
